org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class Concepts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.helpers.Concepts

  • public class Concepts
extends java.lang.Object
    Task class to export a report of all clinical concepts (aka Codes) that Synthea is aware of. Format is "system,code,display".
